PostExample/0-0-0-8/pt-br/exemplos/como-.html:
De acordo com analytics.google.com<\/a>:<\/p>

"O Google Analytics permite que você avalie o ROI de publicidade, bem como rastreie o Flash, vídeo e mídias sociais em sites e aplicativos."<\/p>

Você pode aproveitar as vantagens do contexto<\/a> e dos eventos personalizados<\/a> para criar um componente que envia eventos GTAG dinamicamente.<\/p>

O GTAG só pode ser chamado depois de hydrate<\/code><\/a> para garantir que está sendo executado no cliente.<\/p> 

import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> GoogleAnalytics<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  hydrate<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span>router,<\/span> page,<\/span> id}<\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    window.<\/span>dataLayer =<\/span> window.<\/span>dataLayer ||<\/span> [<\/span>]<\/span>;<\/span>
    function<\/span> gtag<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span>{<\/span>
      dataLayer.<\/span>push<\/span>(<\/span>arguments)<\/span>;<\/span>
    }<\/span>
    gtag<\/span>(<\/span>'js'<\/span>,<\/span> new<\/span> Date<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span>)<\/span>;<\/span>
    gtag<\/span>(<\/span>'config'<\/span>,<\/span> id,<\/span> {<\/span>
      page_title<\/span>:<\/span> page.<\/span>title,<\/span>
      page_path<\/span>:<\/span> router.<\/span>url
    }<\/span>)<\/span>;<\/span>
    window.<\/span>addEventListener<\/span>(<\/span>page.<\/span>event,<\/span> (<\/span>)<\/span> =><\/span> {<\/span>
      gtag<\/span>(<\/span>'event'<\/span>,<\/span> 'page_view'<\/span>,<\/span> {<\/span>
        page_title<\/span>:<\/span> page.<\/span>title,<\/span>
        page_path<\/span>:<\/span> router.<\/span>url
      }<\/span>)<\/span>
    }<\/span>)<\/span>
  }<\/span>
  
  render<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span>id}<\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>script<\/span> 
        async<\/span>
        src<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>`<\/span>https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=<\/span>${<\/span>id}<\/span><\/span>`<\/span><\/span>}<\/span><\/span>
      /><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> GoogleAnalytics;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>
import<\/span> GoogleAnalytics from<\/span> './GoogleAnalytics'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Application<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  // ...<\/span>

  render<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>main<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
        <<\/span>GoogleAnalytics<\/span><\/span> id<\/span>=<\/span>"<\/span>SUBSTITUA_COM_SEU_ID_DO_GOOGLE_ANALYTICS"<\/span><\/span> /><\/span><\/span>
      </<\/span>main<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>


}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Application;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

Usando um Wrapper<\/a><\/h2>
Alternativamente, você pode instalar o nullstack-google-analytics<\/a> como uma dependência:<\/p>

npm install nullstack-<\/span>google-<\/span>analytics
<\/code><\/pre>

import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>
import<\/span> GoogleAnalytics from<\/span> 'nullstack-google-analytics'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Application<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  // ...<\/span>

  render<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>main<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
        <<\/span>GoogleAnalytics<\/span><\/span> id<\/span>=<\/span>"<\/span>SUBSTITUA_COM_SEU_ID_DO_GOOGLE_ANALYTICS"<\/span><\/span> /><\/span><\/span>
      </<\/span>main<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>


}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Application;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>
